attributes.action: Create a covid un-vaccination blood bank for un-vaccinated people who need blood
attributes.additional_details: If a person has chosen to not have the covid jabs for any particular reason, and for whatever that reason is, whether it is down to  a belief system or for their own health and medical situation, that if they need to be given blood that the blood they recieve is free of covid vaccination.
attributes.background: create a covid un-vaccination blood bank for un-vaccinated people. This is essential for those who need blood/ transfusions who have not  had covid vaccinations due to their medical reasons or from their beliefs or person choice.

rejection.details: Decisions on safety and blood donation are made based on the advice of the Advisory Committee on the Safety of Blood, Tissues and Organs, and the administration of the Blood and Transplant system is the responsibility of the NHS, not the Government or Parliament.
